Name: [Revelation] Shaft Break
Desc:
[Revelation Skill]
Arrows explode and Malice remains as a tornado tormenting enemies. Only in the explosion, Death Blessing grants the Blessing of Death, and the explosion and tornado do not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
Consumes 67 MP and penetrates up to 3 enemies at 216% Damage 3 times.
Pulls up to 7 enemies when destroyed and explodes, and the explosion attacks up to 10 enemies at 270% Damage 10 times.
The tornado attacks up to 10 enemies at 55% Damage 3 times in a row.
Cooldown: 11 sec
